lib/tsp/tsp.c

00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Wrapper for calling TSP solvers and heuristics.
00003  *
00004  * Wrapper for solvers and heuristics for the traveling salesman problem.
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup lib
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "tsp.h"
00011 
00012 /**
00013  *  @brief  Solves TSP with Concorde's Lin-Kernighan heuristic.
00014  *  @param  tsp_solver [in] the TSP solver to use
00015  *  @param  problem [in] problem to solve
00016  *  @param  params [in] Lin-Kernighan params (can be NULL)
00017  *  @param  result [out] TSP solution
00018  */                  
00019 int
00020 arrow_tsp_solve(int tsp_solver, arrow_problem *problem, void *params,
00021                       arrow_tsp_result *result)
00022 {
00023     switch(tsp_solver)
00024     {
00025         case ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT:
00026             return arrow_tsp_cc_exact_solve(problem, (int *)params, result);
00027             break;
00028         case ARROW_TSP_CC_LK:
00029             return arrow_tsp_cc_lk_solve(problem, 
00030                                          (arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params *)params, 
00031                                          result);
00032             break;
00033         case ARROW_TSP_RAI:
00034             return arrow_tsp_rai_solve(problem,
00035                                        (arrow_tsp_rai_params *)params,
00036                                        result);
00037             break;
00038         default:
00039             arrow_print_error("TSP solver type %d not supported", tsp_solver);
00040             return ARROW_FAILURE;
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 void
00045 arrow_tsp_short_name(int tsp_solver, FILE *out)
00046 {
00047     switch(tsp_solver)
00048     {
00049         case ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT:
00050             fprintf(out, "cc_exact"); break;
00051         case ARROW_TSP_CC_LK:
00052             fprintf(out, "cc_lk"); break;
00053         case ARROW_TSP_RAI:
00054             fprintf(out, "rai"); break;            
00055         default:
00056             arrow_print_error("TSP solver type %d not supported", tsp_solver);
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void
00061 arrow_tsp_long_name(int tsp_solver, FILE *out)
00062 {
00063     switch(tsp_solver)
00064     {
00065         case ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT:
00066             fprintf(out, "CC TSP Solver"); break;
00067         case ARROW_TSP_CC_LK:
00068             fprintf(out, "CC Lin-Kernighan"); break;
00069         case ARROW_TSP_RAI:
00070             fprintf(out, "RAI Solver"); break;
00071         default:
00072             arrow_print_error("TSP solver type %d not supported", tsp_solver);
00073     }
00074 }
